description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Cheese & Tomato + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Cheese & Tomato + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top muffin halves with chicken, tomato and cheese. Place under oven grill until cheese has melted. Allow to cool.

Preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fan-forced. Spray a 10 x 20cm (6cm deep) loaf pan with oil and line base with baking paper, allowing paper to overhang sides. Place flour, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Stir in apple. In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, milk and oil together. Add flour to egg mixture and stir until just combined. Spoon mixture into pan. Bake for 45 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centre comes out clean. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside on a wire rack to cool completely. Place one slice in lunch box. Store remaining loaf in an airtight container in the fridge. (Apple, cinnamon & oat bread serves 10.)
Pack corn in an airtight container.
Pack sunflower seeds and apricots in an airtight container.
